Reason: The configuration option '_prevalenceDirectory' is performance-sensitive. This is because the directory path set by '_prevalenceDirectory' directly impacts the location where the Prevayler will store its essential files (.journal and .snapshot files). The method 'prevalenceDirectory()' is crucial in determining this directory path, and any changes to this configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level in terms of data persistence and accessibility. Therefore, the configuration is considered performance-sensitive based on its direct and substantial effect on system performance.
